:v-model.description: The Two-Way Bindings tab selects a value
:v-model.description_zh: 双向绑定选项卡选择值

:options.description: option data, if the default slot is passed, this parameter is invalid, and the data structure is described above
:options.description_zh: 选项数据，如果传入了默认slot，此参数无效，数据结构见上方说明

height.description: The height of the pop-up drop-down content (the content will be scrolled if the content is exceeded), the slot is invalid when customizing the content (use scroll-view to process it by yourself), the unit is arbitrary, and the default RPX is rpx
height.description_zh: 弹窗下拉内容的高度(内容超出将会滚动)，slot自定义内容时无效(自行使用scroll-view处理)，单位任意，默认rpx

events.name: change
events.description: Every u-dropdown has this callback, which is triggered when an option is clicked
events.description_zh: 每个u-dropdown均有此回调，点击某个options选项时触发

methods.name: highlight
methods.description: index is the index of the menu item to be highlighted (starting from 0), and not writing indicates that the internal highlight is cleared
methods.description_zh: index为需要设置高亮的菜单项的索引(从0开始)，不写表示清空内部的高亮
